name: StudyBlast
0:
”Alexa open Study Blast”
”Alexa start Study Blast”
”Alexa launch Study Blast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: study blast
des:
Blast Learning uses the latest in artificial intelligence to create interactive study material for college courses. With the help of Alexa, learners get the maximum benefit from every study minute as Blast uses the most effective study strategies and customizes the study material to each learner. Go to www.blastlearning.com to learn more.
